creator: system
title: Implement Automated Tax Collection
description:
This proposal introduces an automated tax collection system that calculates progressive tax rates based on user income. The codex will:

1. Calculate income from transfers received during the tax year
2. Apply progressive tax rates (10% up to 10,000, 20% up to 50,000, 30% above)
3. Automatically create tax payment transfers to the treasury

This ensures fair and transparent tax collection across all realm citizens.

creator: system
title: Enable Social Benefits Distribution
description:
This proposal enables automatic distribution of social benefits to eligible realm members. The codex will:

1. Check member eligibility based on residence permit, tax compliance, and identity verification
2. Calculate benefit amounts based on member status and contributions
3. Distribute Service Credits to eligible members automatically

This creates a transparent and fair social safety net for all qualifying citizens.
